column5: Going up for the opener and heard the water was very low a few weeks ago but has come up nicely since ice out. Can anyone verify water levels on Minnitaki?
the chutes will be no problem at all for opener, plenty of water, been through a dozen times in the last few weeks
Hey Troy,Are the lake levels coming up in general? Raining or late snow?Thanks,Pooch

the lakes have come up quite a bit since ice out and are at a good level for the spawn, the chutes and season opener, but I beleive they have already peaked for now, and will probably maintain this level for a few weeks either way, unless we get a substantial amout of rain, the water temps are good and its going to be good fishing, cant wait for opener!
Troy - check your pm about boat storage.
